IFixpointObserver Class Reference

Fixpoint Observer At each Fixpoint pass, Shom Homomorphism will trigger the update function by passing the SDD before fixpoint pass and the SDD after fixpoint pass. More...

Detailed Description

Fixpoint Observer At each Fixpoint pass, Shom Homomorphism will trigger the update function by passing the SDD before fixpoint pass and the SDD after fixpoint pass.
